Functions
Switch_Adherant_account_Menu
int Switch_Adherant_account_Menu(
Member_credentials *ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS,
Member_infos *ADHERANT_INFOS,
int *loggedout
)

The switch Menu associated with the Adherant Account where he can :

  • Update his infos.

  • Delete his account.

Parameters
ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS
Member_credentials*

The structure of the members which will be holding the credentials.

ADHERANT_INFOS
Member_infos*

The structure of the members which will be holding the infos.

loggedout
int*

The status of the member which is necessary to change if the member deletes his account (Should be redirected to the login page)

Returns
if the member press back to go the precedent menu

Returns 1

if not

Returns 0

See Also

Modify_Or_Delete_Member

Switch_Adherant_Borrowing_Menu
int Switch_Adherant_Borrowing_Menu(
Borrowing_Infos *LOAN,
Film_Infos *FILM,
Member_credentials *ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS,
Member_infos *ADHERANT_INFOS
)

The switch Menu associated with the Adherant Borrowings where he can :

  • Browse the films by type.

  • Borrow a film.

  • See his personal borrowings.

  • Return a borrowed film.

Parameters
LOAN
Borrowing_Infos*

The Loan structure to hold the Borrowing infos i.e: Date ,Code ...

FILM
Film_Infos*

The Film structure which will be holding the film info

ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS
Member_credentials*

The structure of the members which will be holding the credentials.

ADHERANT_INFOS
Member_infos*

The structure of the members which will be holding the infos.

Returns
if the member press back to go the precedent menu

Returns 1

if not

Returns 0

See Also

Display_Film_By_Type / Display_Personal_Borrowed_Films / Borrow_Return_Film / Checking_Max_Borrows / Check_If_Borrows

Switch_ADMIN_account_Menu
int Switch_ADMIN_account_Menu(
Member_credentials *ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS,
Member_infos *ADHERANT_INFOS,
int *loggedout
)

The switch Menu associated with the ADMIN Account where he can :

  • Add a new member to the club

  • Modify or Delete any memeber

  • Monitor the list of the Club members

Parameters
ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS
Member_credentials*

The structure of the members which will be holding the credentials.

ADHERANT_INFOS
Member_infos*

The structure of the members which will be holding the infos.

loggedout
int*

The status of the member which is necessary to change if the member deletes his account (Should be redirected to the login page)

Returns
if the member press back to go the precedent menu

Returns 1

if not

Returns 0

See Also

Add_Member / Modify_Or_Delete_Member / Member_Alpha_Display

Switch_ADMIN_FILM_Menu
int Switch_ADMIN_FILM_Menu(
Film_Infos *FILM,
Member_credentials *ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS
)

The switch Menu associated with the ADMIN Films where he can :

  • Add a new Film to the club

  • Modify or Delete a specific film

  • Monitor the films list

Parameters
FILM
Film_Infos*

The Film structure which will be holding the film info

ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS
Member_credentials*

The structure of the members which will be holding the credentials.

Returns
if the member press back to go the precedent menu

Returns 1

if not

Returns 0

See Also

Add_Film / Modify_Or_Delete_Film / Display_Film_By_Type

Switch_ADMIN_Borrowing_Menu
int Switch_ADMIN_Borrowing_Menu(
Borrowing_Infos *LOAN,
Film_Infos *FILM,
Member_credentials *ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS,
Member_infos *ADHERANT_INFOS
)

The switch Menu associated with the ADMIN Borrowings where he can :

  • All the Adherant accessibilities.

  • Monitor the Global borrowed films with the number of copies borrowed.

  • Monitor the Global Borrowers list.

  • Monitor the films lent by a specific club member.

Parameters
LOAN
Borrowing_Infos*

The Loan structure to hold the Borrowing infos i.e: Date ,Code ...

FILM
Film_Infos*

The Film structure which will be holding the film info

ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS
Member_credentials*

The structure of the members which will be holding the credentials.

ADHERANT_INFOS
Member_infos*

The structure of the members which will be holding the infos.

Returns
if the member press back to go the precedent menu

Returns 1

if not

Returns 0

See Also

Display_Film_By_Type / Display_Personal_Borrowed_Films / Borrow_Return_Film / Checking_Max_Borrows / Check_If_Borrows / delay

MAIN_Switch
void MAIN_Switch(
Borrowing_Infos *LOAN,
Film_Infos *FILM,
Member_credentials *ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS,
Member_infos *ADHERANT_INFOS
)

The Core principal switch Menu associated with the Member whether be ADMIN or ADHERANT where They can :

  • Sign in to their account.

  • Sign up by becoming a new member to the club

Parameters
LOAN
Borrowing_Infos*

The Loan structure to hold the Borrowing infos i.e: Date ,Code ...

FILM
Film_Infos*

The Film structure which will be holding the film info

ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS
Member_credentials*

The structure of the members which will be holding the credentials.

ADHERANT_INFOS
Member_infos*

The structure of the members which will be holding the infos.
